divs: Sighting DetailsHeading to my banking machine just over St-Patric's bridge a small glowing orb caught my attention.I pointed it out to my son who as i thought it was below cloud level and moving at a constant rate of speed.As we kept walking towards the Vanier parkway heading in an easterly direction we kept watching this object as it suddenly sped up turned right, towards the south, then slowed, and then took off at a great speed and slowly faded from sight in the distance. This is not the first time i see what i would normally associate with a satellite just to watch it do things satellites are not supposed to do.Most of the time they seem to be coming from over the Gatineau,Quebec mountains to the north of Ottawa just a couple miles away.I did not take photo's for phone cams are terrible (well mine is anyway) so i don't bother anymore.
